channel.title: performance on byteloom - Marek Mierzwa
channel.description: Recent content in performance on byteloom - Marek Mierzwa

item.title: WebPagetest - distributed web profiler
item.description: There are many popular tools for web performance profiling/debugging these days. From my personal tool set I could mention Firebug, IE Developers Toolbar (integrated with IE from version > 8) or Fiddler.
